title: Micro Array: 96-well to 384-well plate
author: Opentrons
description:
This protocol performs a micro array transfer by transferring the contents of 4 96-well plates to 1 384-well plate (one-to-one well-to-well transfers).



Bio-Rad Hardshell 96-well PCR plate 200ul #hsp9601
Corning 384-well Plate 112ul
Opentrons P50 multi-channel electronic pipette
Opentrons 300ul tiprack
process:
Input the mount side for your P50 multi-channel pipette, the transfer volume (in ul), the tip strategy (same tip for all transfers, or new tips for each transfer), and the tip column to select (if using the same tips for all transfers).
Download your protocol.
Upload your protocol into the OT App.
Set up your deck according to the deck map.
Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our support articles.
Hit "Run".
notes: If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact the Protocol Development Team by filling out the Troubleshooting Survey.

markdown.title: Micro Array: 96-well to 384-well plate
markdown.author: [Opentrons](https://opentrons.com/)
markdown.description:
This protocol performs a micro array transfer by transferring the contents of 4 96-well plates to 1 384-well plate (one-to-one well-to-well transfers).

---
![Materials Needed](https://s3.amazonaws.com/opentrons-protocol-library-website/custom-README-images/001-General+Headings/materials.png)

* [Bio-Rad Hardshell 96-well PCR plate 200ul #hsp9601](http://www.bio-rad.com/en-us/sku/hsp9601-hard-shell-96-well-pcr-plates-low-profile-thin-wall-skirted-white-clear?ID=hsp9601)
* [Corning 384-well Plate 112ul](https://ecatalog.corning.com/life-sciences/b2c/US/en/Microplates/Assay-Microplates/384-Well-Microplates/Corning%C2%AE-384-well-Clear-Polystyrene-Microplates/p/corning384WellClearPolystyreneMicroplates)
* [Opentrons P50 multi-channel electronic pipette](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/ot-2-pipettes/products/8-channel-electronic-pipette)
* [Opentrons 300ul tiprack](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/opentrons-tips/products/opentrons-300ul-tips)
markdown.process:
1. Input the mount side for your P50 multi-channel pipette, the transfer volume (in ul), the tip strategy (same tip for all transfers, or new tips for each transfer), and the tip column to select (if using the same tips for all transfers).
2. Download your protocol.
3. Upload your protocol into the [OT App](https://opentrons.com/ot-app).
4. Set up your deck according to the deck map.
5. Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our [support articles](https://support.opentrons.com/en/collections/1559720-guide-for-getting-started-with-the-ot-2).
6. Hit "Run".
markdown.notes: If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact the Protocol Development Team by filling out the [Troubleshooting Survey](https://protocol-troubleshooting.paperform.co/).
